attributes.action: Make it compulsory for fat birds to look in a mirror before going out in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Looking at a fat bird in a cropped shirt is not nice so make them look in a mirror before venturing outside so they can see just how revolting it is. When they realise it they'll cover themselves up leaving us to look at nice slim birds.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
